name: part_006
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】The First Note【 #⁠音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025 】#hololiveDEV_IS #ReGLOSS [mt8AyISL9Ig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Otonose Kanade performs her rendition of 'No title'.
Transition sequence featuring dynamic stage lighting and visual effects.
Otonose Kanade and Kobo Kanaeru perform a high-energy duet of 'BANG!!!'.

subtitles.original: 幼い頃から気づいたらそばにいた
subtitles.english: Since I was young, I realized you were always by my side

subtitles.original: まるで空気のようだ
subtitles.english: Just like the very air I breathe

subtitles.original: 僕は君とギュッと手を繋いで
subtitles.english: I held your hand tightly

subtitles.original: 楽しいことも涙も
subtitles.english: The fun times and the tears

subtitles.original: 僕は君に話して聞かせた
subtitles.english: I told you all about them

subtitles.original: 僕を笑う人やけなす声
subtitles.english: The voices of those who laugh or mock me

subtitles.original: かき消えるように
subtitles.english: So they would be drowned out

subtitles.original: この声を君が自身の体温と共鳴させてくれ
subtitles.english: Let this voice resonate with your own body temperature

subtitles.original: 使い捨てだって言って腐っても
subtitles.english: Even if they call it disposable and it rots

subtitles.original: 止まらないハイファイ　対等な期待
subtitles.english: The unstoppable hi-fi, equal expectations

subtitles.original: 一瞬めぐる間の
subtitles.english: In the span of a single moment

subtitles.original: たった一瞬だけでも
subtitles.english: Even if just for a single instant

subtitles.original: 交わる鼓動　音を繋ぐ色
subtitles.english: Intersecting heartbeats, colors connecting sounds

subtitles.original: 次は僕が君に歌うんだ
subtitles.english: Next, I'll be the one singing to you

subtitles.original: 緩やかに崩れ割れていく
subtitles.english: Slowly crumbling and breaking apart

subtitles.original: ゆるりゆるり首を絞めるより
subtitles.english: Rather than slowly, slowly being strangled

subtitles.original: 昨日までの僕が殺されていく
subtitles.english: The me until yesterday is being killed

subtitles.original: 緩やかに離ればなれを
subtitles.english: Slowly, drifting apart

subtitles.original: くらりんに君に聞こえるのは
subtitles.english: In your daze, what you hear

subtitles.original: 僕が知らない声になって
subtitles.english: Becomes a voice I don't know

subtitles.original: 緩やかに崩れ割れていく
subtitles.english: Slowly crumbling and breaking apart

subtitles.original: ゆるりゆるり首を絞めるより
subtitles.english: Rather than slowly, slowly being strangled

subtitles.original: 昨日までの僕が殺されていく
subtitles.english: The me until yesterday is being killed

subtitles.original: 緩やかに離ればなれを
subtitles.english: Slowly, drifting apart

subtitles.original: くらりんに君に聞こえるのは
subtitles.english: In your daze, what you hear

subtitles.original: 僕が知らない声になって
subtitles.english: Becomes a voice I don't know

subtitles.original: いつか君に届くかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll reach you someday

subtitles.original: いやそんな日はきっと来ないだろうな
subtitles.english: No, such a day will surely never come

subtitles.original: 声も体もボロボロ君に救われた何億分の一
subtitles.english: Voice and body tattered, one in hundreds of millions saved by you

subtitles.original: 形を合わせ彩った
subtitles.english: The shapes fit together, colored

subtitles.original: 音で世界が溢れた
subtitles.english: The world overflowed with sound

subtitles.original: 巡り巡り出会ったこの音を聞く
subtitles.english: Listening to this sound we met by chance

subtitles.original: すべてが
subtitles.english: Everything

subtitles.original: 緩やかに崩れ割れていく
subtitles.english: Slowly crumbling and breaking apart

subtitles.original: ゆるりゆるり首を絞めるより
subtitles.english: Rather than slowly, slowly being strangled

subtitles.original: 昨日までの僕が殺されていく
subtitles.english: The me until yesterday is being killed

subtitles.original: 緩やかに離ればなれを
subtitles.english: Slowly, drifting apart

subtitles.original: くらりんに君に聞こえるのは
subtitles.english: In your daze, what you hear

subtitles.original: 僕が知らない声になって
subtitles.english: Becomes a voice I don't know

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い重視 I don't care what you think
subtitles.english: Prioritizing likes and dislikes, I don't care what you think

subtitles.original: 掲げてこー　マジョリティ　あたしに負けはなし
subtitles.english: Let's hold it high, the majority, I never lose

subtitles.original:
BANG!!!
作詞：ryo (supercell) 作曲：Giga
subtitles.english:
BANG!!!
Lyrics: ryo (supercell) Music: Giga

subtitles.original: ここまでって引かれたその境界線（ボーダー）だれのルール？
subtitles.english: This boundary line drawn 'this far', whose rule is it?

subtitles.original: 案の定乗り越えたWe've got
subtitles.english: As expected, we've crossed it, we've got

subtitles.original: 強く鳴った心笑い飛ばした　Get haha
subtitles.english: Laughed off the heart that beat strongly, Get haha

subtitles.original: 言いたいことは言う
subtitles.english: I say what I want to say

subtitles.original: やりたくないことはしない
subtitles.english: I don't do what I don't want to do

subtitles.original: 悪意気にしない　エナジー全開だわ
subtitles.english: I don't care about malice, my energy is at full throttle

subtitles.original: 道無き道のそう前進だわ
subtitles.english: Moving forward even on a pathless road

subtitles.original: あたしも変わんない　ニューノーマルの時代
subtitles.english: I won't change either, in this new normal era

subtitles.original: Everybody say I want to be free
subtitles.english: Everybody say I want to be free

subtitles.original: いつまでも思いを言わない　それじゃ何も変えられん
subtitles.english: If you never speak your mind, you won't change anything

subtitles.original: Everybody say I want life more
subtitles.english: Everybody say I want life more

subtitles.original: 叶えて自分肯定　生きてるんだって
subtitles.english: Grant yourself self-affirmation, you're alive

subtitles.original: 生きてるんだって
subtitles.english: Saying I'm alive

subtitles.original: ねぇ　生きてるんだって
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm alive

subtitles.original: 歌え今
subtitles.english: Sing it now

subtitles.original: うたいま
subtitles.english: Sing it out

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh-oh
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh-oh

subtitles.original: 産声あげたその時から選ばれてきたんだ　思い出せ
subtitles.english: We've been chosen from our first cry, remember that

subtitles.original: あたしはあたしだ　不可能（不可）なことなんて
subtitles.english: I am who I am, things like impossibilities...

subtitles.original: 何一つもないそうじゃない？　最高峰（ダイモン）に
subtitles.english: ...there isn't even one, right? To the highest peak

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い重視 I don't care what you think
subtitles.english: Prioritizing likes and dislikes, I don't care what you think

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い重視 I don't care what you think
subtitles.english: Prioritizing likes and dislikes, I don't care what you think

subtitles.original: フォルテ鳴らす
subtitles.english: Sound the forte

subtitles.original: このリリックかます
subtitles.english: Deliver these lyrics

subtitles.original: わからす挑発　下向いて舌打ちからの　はっ？
subtitles.english: A clear provocation, a look down and a tongue click... hah?

subtitles.original: Excuse me?
subtitles.english: Excuse me?

subtitles.original: 容赦せず倍返し　パンチライン　聞かせてあげるわ
subtitles.english: Payback with no mercy, I'll show you a punchline

subtitles.original: ヤケ火傷考えな
subtitles.english: Think about the burns you'll get

subtitles.original: あたしが憑いてるからな
subtitles.english: Because I'm right here with you
